sentences.cn: …对经济形势普遍的悲观看法。

sentences.en: An atmosphere of pessimism pervades the economy.
sentences.cn: 悲观的气氛笼罩着整个经济.

sentences.en: At some point a more optimistic outlook replaces the previous pessimism.
sentences.cn: 达到一定程度后,更为乐观的情绪代替了先前的悲观情绪.

sentences.en: Beneath this documentary air , there lay a deep pessimism.
sentences.cn: 在这种记实性的外观之下, 潜伏着一种浓厚的悲观情绪.

sentences.en: He has a tendency towards pessimism.
His mood of deep pessimism cannot have been leavened by his mode of transport—a black cab.
sentences.cn: 他极度悲观沮丧，而他的代步工具——一辆黑色的出租车，丝毫不能舒缓这一情绪。

sentences.en: His pessimism has the effect of depressing everyone.
sentences.cn: 他的悲观情绪感染得大家情绪低落.

sentences.en: I don't want to hear any more pessimism.
sentences.cn: 我不想再听到什么悲观的论调了.

sentences.en: In contrast to their pessimism, I myself was feeling a remarkable euphoria.
sentences.cn: 与他们的悲观情绪相反, 我却感到异常欣快.

sentences.en: Optimism was gradually taking the place of pessimism.
sentences.cn: 乐观情绪逐渐取代了悲观主义。

sentences.en: There is a mood of pessimism in the company about future job prospects.
sentences.cn: 公司中有一种对工作前景悲观的情绪。

sentences.en: There is the note of pessimism in his writings.
sentences.cn: 他的著作带有悲观色彩.

sentences.en: There was a note of pessimism in what he said.
sentences.cn: 他的讲话带着悲观的调子.

sentences.en: There were good grounds for pessimism about future progress.
sentences.cn: 对将来的发展持悲观态度是有充分依据的.

sentences.en: With whole continents experiencing a decline in living standards there is ample ground for pessimism.
sentences.cn: 世界各大洲生活水平都在下降,所以悲观主义有充分的依据.
